content.text:
<thinking>The user requested health status for ONLY the ledger service. The Ledger Agent returned:

- Healthy status confirmation
- Environment details (dev, v3.3)
- Database and Kafka connectivity
- Operational API endpoints

Since:
1. The request was ledger-specific
2. The toolResult shows healthy status
3. Exact service name reporting is required

Will report "HEALTHY" per instructions while omitting technical details from the response.</thinking>

**Ledger Service Status**: HEALTHY  
The system is operational with all components functioning as expected.
